title: Commending the Emerling Agency, LLC upon the occasion of its designation as recipient of the Business of the Year Award
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  commending  the  Emerling  Agency, LLC upon the
occasion of its designation as recipient of the  Business  of  the  Year
Award by the Clarence Chamber of Commerce

WHEREAS,  It  is the sense of this Legislative Body to honor those busi-
nesses within the State of New York which distinguish themselves through
outstanding professional behavior, corporate  innovation,  and  enduring
commitment to the community; and
  WHEREAS, This Legislative Body is justly proud to commend the Emerling
Agency,  LLC  upon  the  occasion of its designation as recipient of the
Business of the Year Award by the Clarence Chamber of  Commerce,  to  be
celebrated  at  its Annual Awards Dinner on Thursday, February 24, 2011;
and
  WHEREAS, This award is what many consider  to  be  the  highest  honor
bestowed  in  the  town  of  Clarence, for which Emerling Agency is much
honored to receive; the Emerling Agency is an Independent Insurance  and
Financial  Services  company  of  17 staff members operated by President
Paul Barone LUTCF; George Emerling CIC; Scott  Medole  and  Mark  Medole
CIC,  while founders Norman and Nancy Emerling still continue to provide
on-going consulting; and
  WHEREAS, In recent years, the Emerling Agency has partnered with McMa-
hon, Stahlka and Floss Agencies to create the EMS Group; the  EMS  Group
has  grown to be one of the most respected and resourceful insurance and
financial service groups in Western New York through their dedication to
their clients and community involvement; and
  WHEREAS, The  Emerling  Agency  has  always  strived  to  be  actively
involved  and  in  support  of the Clarence community; staff members are
participants in several  different  community  organizations,  including
Rotary,  Lions  and  Kiwanis  Clubs,  local fire companies, foundations,
associations, and church groups; and
  WHEREAS, With January of 2011 marking the Emerling Agency's 30th anni-
versary in business, its principal  goal  is  to  provide  the  Clarence
community with the best insurance and financial experience possible; the
staff  is  a group of dedicated and educated professionals who strive to
satisfy the needs of their clients, matching them with the best possible
product available; and
  WHEREAS, Businesses such as the Emerling Agency, LLC exert  a  strong,
positive  influence  on  the  communities  they  serve and are a crucial
element in the economy of New York State; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause  in  its  deliberations  to
commend the Emerling Agency, LLC upon the occasion of its designation as
recipient  of  the Business of the Year Award by the Clarence Chamber of
Commerce; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to the Emerling Agency, LLC.
